replies.body:
Heyo! I'm from zealous gaming and I'd like to over you the ability to come join us! We allow you to host teams and join our existing teams at your level. Teams are ran by the members of our community and on their own rules and accord. Come check us out!
Teamspeak:zealousgaming.ts3ip.com
http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=lind you can adda me if you wish

Sup Main, not a smurf but add me if you at least want to try out a couple games. Always willing to learn as well.

na.op.gg/summoner/userName=9tt2
